name: prismatic wrist warmers
sizes_available: toddler, child, tween, small adult, adult
notes:
this pattern is available for free at https://www.windingroadcrochet.com/crochet-wrist-warmers-free-pattern
or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer-friendly large font ad-free version of the pattern.

the pattern is written in english using us terms.

pattern level: easy/intermediate
this pattern uses the chain, single crochet, slip stitch, and,  half double crochet, working in the back loops only, working int the third loop. 

materials needed:
size 4 yarn
5 mm crochet hook
yarn needle and scissors

this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download, not a finished product. please make sure to download adobe reader at www.adobe.com if you do not already have it on your computer.
